purpose: Facilitate the creation and deployment of sophisticated AI agents by providing a flexible and code-first toolkit.
principle: Built on Python, it leverages modular architecture to allow developers to construct and manage AI agents with ease.
reusability: Highly modular with plug-and-play components, extensive API support for integration with other systems.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have stability issues and limited documentation. Some features might be under development.
name: adk-python
description: An open-source, code-first Python toolkit for building, evaluating, and deploying sophisticated AI agents with flexibility and control.
highlight: A comprehensive Python toolkit for building, evaluating, and deploying AI agents with flexibility and control.
